About

Hi, I'm Reverie.

I'm an artist, creative technologist, and digital craftsperson.

I'm currently exploring the historical and conceptual intersection of technology and traditional craft.

My work focuses on creating unexpected connections across mediums and finding new ways to share them.

I am currently based in New York City and pursuing a Master's in Interactive Media Arts at NYU’s Tisch School of the Arts.
